word_mean: 结晶的，晶状的，透明的：性质或清晰度似结晶的

sentence.Network_en: Carbon steels exist in three stable crystalline phases.
sentence.Network_cn: 碳素钢含有3种稳定的结晶状态.

sentence.Network_en: China was the first country in the world to synthesize crystalline insulin, a bioactive protein.
sentence.Network_cn: 中国在世界上最早用人工方法合成一种有生物活力的蛋白质--结晶胰岛素.

sentence.Network_en: Diamond is the crystalline form of the element carbon.
sentence.Network_cn: 钻石是碳元素的晶体结构。

list.abs: ...网膜(retina)，它们又各分为若干层。三层膜内为屈光介质，即房水(aqueous humor)、晶状体(crystalline lens)和玻璃体(vitreous humor)。巩膜(即外膜)为白色纤维层。在后部，视神经纤维通过筛板(l.
...因此，又称为褶皱基底(fold basement)或结晶基底(crystalline basement)。当地台基底形成于前寒武纪时.
应用材料提供用于生产晶体硅(crystalline silicon)技术与薄膜太阳能光电板(thin-film solar panels)的设备，这两种技术在印度都得到.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French cristallin, via Latin from Greek krustallinos, from krustallos (see crystal)

entry.tran: 结晶的;晶状的;含水晶的
entry.def: A crystalline substance is in the form of crystals or contains crystals.

example.ex: Diamond is the crystalline form of the element carbon.
example.tran: 钻石是碳元素的晶体结构。

example.ex: ...a huge plain dotted with crystalline lakes.
example.tran: 辽阔的平原上遍布着清澈的湖泊

means.word_mean: 1. consisting of or containing or of the nature of crystals;
3. transmitting light; able to be seen through with clarity;

sentences.sentence: "the cold crystalline water of melted snow"
"could see the sand on the bottom of the limpid pool"
